page.title: 08FUEL SUPPLIES ON RHUM
page.content:
Living on an island means that many things other people take for granted are not so commonplace to us. For example, fuel supplies have to be ordered and organised.
The Lochmor carries a 45 gallon drum of petrol whenever this is required.
The gas boat comes about three to four times a year and brings about 30 bottles of Calor gas.
The Puffer comes a year and brings 80 tons of coal. This is stored in a large coal dump and is delivered to homes as required.
The Western Isles will bring diesel, which is needed for the Landrovers, when it's needed.
